image_analysis.product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
key_features: Pair of 1 KG dumbbells for a total of 2 KG resistance
Cast iron core with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Anti-slip neoprene surface for a secure, comfortable grip
Printed weight number on each end cap for easy identification
Color-coded pink design to quickly distinguish weight
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
Suitable for home gym, fitness classes, and general resistance training
Compact size ideal for indoor workouts and small spaces
image_analysis.usage: Used for strength and resistance training exercises at home, in fitness classes, or in a personal workout area.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home exercisers, beginners, and fitness enthusiasts looking for light, non-slip dumbbells for indoor workouts.
image_analysis.ai_description: Pair of pink KAKSS neoprene dumbbells, each clearly marked 1 KG, with a hexagonal, non-slip design that stays put on the floor. Compact and color-coded, they’re ideal for home workouts, fitness classes, and light strength training.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Anti-slip neoprene coating provides a secure, comfortable grip
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Reduces the chance of the dumbbells slipping from sweaty hands, making workouts safer and more controlled.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Hexagonal ends keep the dumbbells from rolling
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Prevents weights from moving around the floor, protecting surfaces and keeping the workout area organized.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Printed, color-coded 1 KG markings on each end
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Allows quick identification of weight at a glance, saving time when switching exercises or sharing equipment.

comparison_points.customer_benefit: Compact 1 KG pair suitable for home and class use
comparison_points.why_it_matters: Easy to store and handle in small spaces, making it practical for apartments, home gyms, and group fitness sessions.
